site_name: Hurlingham Club Ranelagh GardensLondonSW6 3PR
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T10016 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Reduce height and branch length by 1-2m. Final cuts to be <8cm diameterT10094 - Hybird blac poplars - Reduce length of all principal limbs to produce an overall crown height of 9-10mT10279 - Fell to ground level - Due to evident decline and risk of failure on to footpath.T10301 - Norway Maple (Acer platanoides) - Reduce height and lateral branch length by 3-4m T10309 - London plane (Platanus x acerifolia) - Reduce elongated eastward limb in upper-crown by approx. 4mT10310 - London plane (Platanus x acerifolia) - Reduce limb colonised by Inonotus hispidus overhanging footpath by approx. 3m; Remove major deadwood throughout crown, specifically large diameter limb in the upper crown to the south overhanging boundaryT10350 - White Willow (Salix alba) - Reduce height and branch length by 3-4mT10353 - ...
